short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take control of your browsing habits with mindful delays. Stop distractions, boost focus, and regain your productivity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay focused and boost your productivity with this simple but powerful extension. When you try to visit distracting websites, it creates a thoughtful pause – giving you a moment to decide if now is the right time.

Key Features:

Adds a customizable delay before accessing distracting websites
* Helps you make conscious decisions about your browsing habits
* Simple setup - just add your list of distracting sites
* Clean, distraction-free interface
* No tracking, respects your privacy

Perfect for:
✓ Students needing to focus on studies
✓ Professionals wanting to boost productivity
✓ Anyone looking to build better digital habits

Break free from mindless browsing and rediscover your focus. Install now and take the first step toward more intentional online time.
